item.title: Parting Gifts Puzzle
item.description:
TranscribedDecodedprj_Home.exe playthroughThe video content reads _ _ _ - 3 = KEY 1 3 2Reversing the audio revealed the song "A Hundred And Sixty Acres" by Marty RobbinsThe Sleuths were stuck here for quite a while. As a result, INDI provided a hint through SYSTEM in the Discord channel, see SYSTEM > IN_DI Message.The solution was to take the number "160" from the Marty Robins song and put the digits in the order 1 3 2, as per instructed by the video content:1 0 6 - 3 = KEY 1 3 2meaning KEY = 10324 24 44 6F 69 6E 67 20 64 65 74 65 63 74 69 6E 67 20 77 69 74 68 69 6E 20 61 6E 20 69 6D 61 67 65 20 69 73 20 68 61 72 64 2C 20 62 75 74 20 67 6F 69 6E 67 20 62 61 63 6B 20 74 68 6F 75 67 68 20 69 74 20 74 6F 0A 24 24 66 69 6E 64 20 74 68 6F 73 65 20 73 65 71 75 65 6E 63 65 73 20 69 73 20 65 76 65 6E 20 68 61 72 64 65 72 2E 2E 2E 20 3C 23 46 33 33 32 31 31 3E 0A 0A 6C 65 74 20 6C 69 73 74 20 3D 20 5B 31 35 2C 20 32 2C 20 38 2C 20 33 2C 20 37 2C 20 31 30 2C 20 39 2C 20 31 32 2C 20 31 33 2C 20 31 36 2C 20 31 31 2C 20 31 2C 20 34 2C 20 35 2C 20 36 2C 20 31 37 2C 20 31 34 5D 0A 45 58 50 4F 52 54 5B 46 49 4C 45 7E 74 68 72 6F 75 67 68 2B 2B 7B 24 27 4D 45 47 41 27 7D 7C 28 6C 69 6E 6B 29 5D 3A 75 72 6C 3D 22 7C 55 53 45 28 46 74 4C 29 2B 2B 2B 3D 3E 28 66 6F 72 20 76 61 72 20 3D 3D 20 49 20 3E 3E 20 6C 69 73 74 3C 69 74 65 6D 73 3E 3E 72 5C 6C 69 73 74 3C 7C 22 0A16 bNJ 3 G6j 9 Wf0 14 dRd0 7 CqA 2 ACZ 5 any 1 cPT 13 FcQ 10 gY5 11 kBl 8 SY# 4 0iv 12 FuL 6 -fA 17 Ebb 15 4e1$$Doing detecting within an image is hard, but going back though it to $$find those sequences is even harder... <#F33211>let list = [15, 2, 8, 3, 7, 10, 9, 12, 13, 16, 11, 1, 4, 5, 6, 17, 14] EXPORT[FILE~through++{$'MEGA'}|(link)]:url="|USE(FtL)+++=>(for var == I >> list<items>>r\list<|"The sequence in the list corresponded to the order in which to combine the segments from the video "KEY"This was recognized as being the ID for a Mega link, which resulted in this file:83.45 MB file on MEGA“YouTube/Videos/7-10 Tone/BACKTONE-COMPLETED{KPJV, ETSN, YMUK, WWEV}.md” could not be found.Create new noteSwap file...RemoveYouTube/Videos/7-10 Tone/BACKTONE-COMPLETED{KPJV, ETSN, YMUK, WWEV}.mdThe computer at the end plays noise that can be decoded with SSTV. This was done by @ThePortalNinja.The result was an image with a mega linkThis canvas illustrates how the "Parting Gifts" puzzle was solved“YouTube/Videos/7-10 Tone/KEY.md” could not be found.Create new noteSwap file...RemoveYouTube/Videos/7-10 Tone/KEY.md“YouTube/Videos/7-10 Tone/lm-1.md” could not be found.Create new noteSwap file...RemoveYouTube/Videos/7-10 Tone/lm-1.md
After the stream STATION_8 TERMINAL 8 ended, two videos were uploaded to the 710 Tone channel:
This pointed at LOG-103.mp4, which had had its video description updated to a long hex string:
The file prj_Home.exe is a bare-bones game made with the game engine Godot. It features a green/black checkered world with nothing but a white house. Within the house is a small computer that plays a range of beeping noises. This is the full extent of the game.
This game had been seen on 710 Tone before, in the video BACKTONE-COMPLETED{KPJV, ETSN, YMUK, WWEV}, which had been uploaded weeks prior.
Attempts at decompiling prj_Home.exe yielded no significant data, and the file metadata was also uninteresting“Media/Sleuth Media/Audio/lm-1 (reversed song).mp3” could not be found.Swap file...RemoveMedia/Sleuth Media/Audio/lm-1 (reversed song).mp3“Media/710 Media/Images/mega link to lm-2.png” could not be found.Swap file...RemoveMedia/710 Media/Images/mega link to lm-2.pngWhich contained the "lm-2" image, Travis' last message (or "parting gift").This is the end of the Parting Gifts puzzle.“Media/710 Media/Images/lm-2.png” could not be found.Swap file...RemoveMedia/710 Media/Images/lm-2.png
